message: Let's start fair, I'll take 99.9% and you can have the rest. Think of it as a good start for your future investments!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  This offer won't be as generous in later rounds due to inflation.
Let's be reasonable. 50/50 split is the fairest way to go. It's time to meet in the middle and avoid further inflation!
